message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation disadvantage I have.
Your turn, Alice. Let's split things a bit more evenly, but acknowledge the time pressure we both face.
Bob, the inflation is hitting you harder than me. This deal is better for you in the long run, even if it seems slightly less even now.
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer is a good compromise considering the inflation is hurting both of us.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before the inflation eats up even more of your potential gains!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option at this point.  Let's end this before we both lose out.
